scripts.poetry-build: cd ../backend && poetry run python setup_exe.py build
scripts.electron-build: ncp electron build\electron && electron-builder build --win -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run poetry-start" "npm run react-start" "npm run electron-start"
scripts.package: npm run poetry-build && npm run react-build && npm run electron-build
scripts.push-release: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Bump version" && git tag -m "Bump Version" -a v%npm_package_version%  && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump: npm version prerelease & npm run push-release
scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch && npm run push-release
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor && npm run push-release
scripts.bump-major: npm version major && npm run push-release
